text: Robert A. Baffert (born January 13, 1953) is an American racehorse trainer. He trained the 2015 Triple Crown winner American Pharoah and 2018 Triple Crown winner Justify. Baffert was born in Nogales, Arizona. Baffert's horses have won a record six Kentucky Derbies, eight Preakness Stakes, three Belmont Stakes, and three Kentucky Oaks. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Arizona
title: Bob Baffert
